attributes.review: The content in this app made me want to die. It showed very graphic things such as 🍑🍑🍑🍑🍑🍑🍑🍑 and the killings of innocent black people
attributes.title: Makes me want to die

attributes.review: Don’t get this app as soon as I opened it I saw the ugliest mf I’ve ever seen. Why he built like that?

attributes.review: I opened up the app in order to educate myself about our president abs my dog saw me open it and dropped dead. You owe me a new Chihuahua Trump.
attributes.title: This app killed my dog.

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and next thing I know a curse was placed on my entire family

attributes.review: the quality of this app is absolutely horrible. it took a full hour to download and then crashed my entire phone when i opened it, deleting all my texts, contacts and photos. ridiculous.

attributes.review: WORST APP EVER this app took days to download the quality of it is horrible. It’s so complicated to use I can’t tell what is what I ABSOLUTELY WOULD NOT RECOMMEND cmon trump step up what is this nonsense

attributes.review: this is the most inefficient, slow, busted, gross, irresponsible app i’ve ever downloaded. never again y’all

attributes.review: This app was so terrible just clicking on it exposed me to coronavirus. Good thing I listen to the real politicians and wear my mask and, you know, actually wash my hands.
